thread.title: Kangana Ranaut REVEALS her best scenes chopped off from 'Rangoon'! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut REVEALS her best scenes chopped off from 'Rangoon'! | Zee News

title: Kangana Ranaut REVEALS her best scenes chopped off from 'Rangoon'! | Zee News
text:
Kangana Ranaut REVEALS her best scenes chopped off from 'Rangoon'! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 10:55 0 
New Delhi: Maverick filmmaker Vishal Bhardwaj's 'Rangoon' saw a line of first-class performance not only from the lead actors—Kangana Ranaut, Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan but also from the supporting cast. Related Gallery Shahid Kapoor, Kangana Ranaut and Saif Ali Khan in 'Rangoon' - Movie Stills 
'Rangoon' is set in the backdrop of World War II and is essentially about a love triangle between Kangana, who plays Miss Julia, Shahid (Nawab Malik) and Saif (Rusi Billimoria). The film hit the screens on February 24, 2017, coinciding with the biggest festival Mahashivratri. 
At a media interaction, IANS quoted Kangana revealing about some of her best scenes being chopped off. She said, “Those scenes were my top-notch performances and I was shattered when I came to know about the edit. I thought without those scenes my performance would be regarded as satisfactory and it won't be appreciated that much. Despite that, people loved it. I am very happy.” MUST READ Rangoon movie review: Kangana Ranaut as Miss Julia is 'bloody hell'; Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan's tussle in love stays with you! 
"Some of my favourite scenes, which were important for the graph of my work were edited. I prepare my character's graph in a linear pattern so when I saw the film Vishal Ji explained why the editing was legitimate," the "Queen" actor said. 
On being asked about compliments from the industry, she said: "More than I expected. Many from industry have complimented and messaged me which is a very sweet gesture." 
(With IANS inputs) First Published: Saturday, February 25, 2017 - 10:55 More from zeenews
